name: Aeternum Realm Abyss (Demo)
description:
Step in the shoes of young knight Derrick who has been tasked with restoring the legacy of his family and with taking down a new evil that has taken over the globe and to put an end to his reign.

Aeternum Realm Abyss is a small RPG Maker MV passion project inspired by medieval fantasy stories and features traditional turn-based RPG gameplay. This demo is just an early look so many things can change within the time of development.

In this demo you can play through the first 2 main game chapters, the first dungeon and the first bonus chapter.

(All sprites that aren't in the main RPG Maker MV engine belong to their owners, full credit to PandaMaru and Avery for the sprite work and thanks to Yanfly for the plugins)
